segments.text: I see the water overflowing and it makes me feel uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it's gross how the water is just spreading all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are making a mess too, climbing on that stool to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy's hands are all over the cookie jar, and it's not very hygienic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting to get a cookie, not caring about the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of disgust at the lack of cleanliness and order in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the cabinets and the floor if it keeps overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman doesn't just turn off the faucet and clean up the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a big mess, and it's really unpleasant to look at.
segments.speaker: PAR
